overview:
Expert in eCommerce marketing, merchandising and sales strategy, skilled at finding and creating new markets and channels for products. Excel in increasing sales and profits in the online space with finance, brand development, contract negotiation, operations, business turn-around and supply chain experience.

Experience: Director of eCommerce - Woot, Inc. September 2003 â€“ Present (5 years)

  • Ecommerce guru on team that developed and launched Woot.com in July 2004
  • Created unique marketing events including Random Crap/Bag of Crap and 2-Fer Tuesdays
  • Manage marketing and merchandising activities for woot.com, sellout.woot.com and wine.woot.com since inception.
  • Manage Drop Ship Program including daily deal programs for several Internet Retailer Top 500 websites

Director of eCommerce Synapse Micro November 2002 â€“ September 2005

  • Launched eCommerce group in Q4 2002
  • Delivered 40,000% revenue growth over 5 year period
  • Developed and launched strategic partnerships with multiple top trafficked internet properties

Director of eCommerce Direct Source Distributing January 2000 - November 2002
